title: General Electric Is Making Headway in Its Wind-Power Business
text:
General Electric is having success in power: wind power.

GE Power is a big topic for shareholders these days. After losses, asset write-downs and sales declines, investors aren’t used to good news. The problems at GE Power, however, are in the fossil-fuel power-generation franchise. The company also makes renewable-power generating equipment, and that business is making headway. On Tuesday, GE announced an agreement with Dogger Bank Wind Farms, which is developing the world’s largest offshore wind farm. GE’s new Haliade-X...
description: GE Power’s problems in fossil-fuel power generation are well documented. But the company also makes renewable-power generating equipment, and that business is making headway.
